successes.title: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries DVD...and More!
successes.description: The Lizzie Bennet Diaries proved that fictional stories can be told through video blogs. What's Next!?

Pledges.description: A "thank you" in our DVD Liner Notes
Thanks on the DVD liner AND receive four Lizzie Bennet Diaries posters (The 3 "Mermaid" posters" and the original poster)

Thanks on the DVD liner AND receive the Lizzie Bennet Diaries Edition of Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen! Yup, we're printing up our own version of the book, designed by the amazing Karen Kavett and with an introduction by Hank Green.
Thanks on the DVD liner PLUS receive four Lizzie Bennet Diaries posters (The 3 "Mermaid" posters" and the original poster) AND all four character button packs.
Thanks on the DVD liner plus all four button pack sets of all the characters AND the Lizzie Bennet Diary journal.

Thanks on the DVD liner AND The Lizzie Bennet Diaries full series 8 disc DVD set. Including all episodes from Lydia, Maria, and Gigi. 10 short features, 20 episode commentaries, and interviews with the cast members and creators.
The DVD plus a Lizzie Bennet Diary Journal.
The DVD plus a Lizzie Bennet Diary Journal signed by Hank Green and Bernie Su.

BY POPULAR DEMAND
The LBD Edition of Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen with an introduction by Hank Green AND the LBD DVD set.
The DVD PLUS The LBD Edition of the book Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen with an introduction by Hank Green AND all FOUR button packs.
The DVD, the Book, and a Lizzie Bennet Diaries Journal signed by Hank Green and Bernie Su.
The DVD, all four buttons packs of the characters, AND an "Lizzie Bennet Diaries" Poster autographed by Ashley Clements, Laura Spencer, Julia Cho, and Mary Kate Wiles.
Two Thanks on the DVD liner and Two DVD sets. Shipped to one address. -- It's 2 DVD sets (by request)
The DVD PLUS the Book PLUS the 4 button packs AND a Lizzie Bennet Diaries Journal signed by Hank Green and Bernie Su.

The DVD, plus all four button packs
AND Mr. Collins ! Maxwell Glick will record a personal voice mail for you.

--- E.g. "You have reached the voice mail box of *Jane Smith*. As you can ascertain, Jane is not available to receive your most valuable correspondance at this moment. Please leave a detailed message and she will return most promptly."
Reasonable requests in variations will be considered for content :-)

The DVD plus all four button packs, plus the journal signed by Hank Green and Bernie Su, plus the book, AND a copy of the script (42 pages) of the first 8 episodes of The Lizzie Bennet Diaries COVER SIGNED by Ashley Clements, Laura Spencer, Mary Kate Wiles, Julia Cho, Bernie Su, Margaret Dunlap, Jenni Powell, Rachel Kiley, and Hank Green.

THE DVD plus all four button packs AND William Darcy ! Daniel Gordh will record a personal voice mail message for you to use as your outgoing message. Reasonable requests in variations will be considered for content :-)

The DVD, plus all four button packs AND a limited 24 x 18 inch black poster featuring the Lizzie Bennet Diaries logo and signatures from the cast, crew, and creators of The Lizzie Bennet Diaries. Only 50 of these will ever exist.

The DVD plus all four button packs, plus the journal signed by Hank Green and Bernie Su, plus the book, plus the script of the first 8 episodes of The LBD signed by cast/crew, AND the script of the LAST 8 episodes (93-100 including QA 10) signed by the writers along with Ashley, Julia, Mary Kate, Jessica Andres, and Daniel Vincent Gordh.
